meanings.sent2: She is sad because she cannot go to the party.
meanings.sent3: The sleepy cat cannot catch the fast mouse.
meanings.sent4: The broken clock cannot tell time anymore.
meanings.sent5: The locked door cannot be opened without a key.

meanings.sent1: He cannot swim in the deep pool.
meanings.sent2: They cannot attend the meeting tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: The dog cannot bark loudly in the library.
meanings.sent4: The plant cannot grow without sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The phone cannot function without a charged battery.

meanings.sent1: The tired child cannot stay awake any longer.
meanings.sent2: The old car cannot start in the cold weather.
meanings.sent3: The shy student cannot speak in front of the class.
meanings.sent4: The broken umbrella cannot keep the rain off.
meanings.sent5: The empty jar cannot hold any more cookies.

meanings.sent2: The sun cannot shine at night.
meanings.sent4: The stone cannot float on water.
meanings.sent5: The pen cannot write without ink.
